title: Amazon raises its ad spending on Elon Musk’s X, in major reversal
summary: Amazon reversed course and significantly increased its advertising spending on Elon Musk’s X after largely boycotting the platform over concerns about hate speech and content moderation
description: Amazon reversed course and significantly increased its advertising spending on Elon Musk’s X after largely boycotting the platform over concerns about hate speech and content moderation
